publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1271.2 Robin Harper: Primary Care Dental Servicesâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-1271) in the name of Susan Deacon, insert at end "but believes that the plans relating to the fluoridation of water supplies as a means of supporting primary care dental services outlined in the action plan should be abandoned in the light of the conclusions of the systematic review of fluoridation by the NHS Centre for Research and Dissemination." Supported by: Tommy Sheridan*
